Articles.Content:
This is the Kraken's Bane. FAR says it is unstable - I say 'by George you're right!' as the craft disintegrates from overexposure to air and hypervelocity. The game and its infernal RAM limits along with the SSTO's instabiltiy mean I have (personally) been unable to get it into orbit. But someone with much more flying skill than I has

![8MOFKdT.png](http://i.imgur.com/8MOFKdT.png)

I refer you to [HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115176-The-Bestest-Pilot-Challenge) for a challenge I made out of this craft.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T15:51:26Z" title="04/13/2015 03:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by BrainiacBlue**
